channel.title: AzureArc on Edwin Young
channel.description: Recent content in AzureArc on Edwin Young

item.title: Azure Arc command-line tools cheat sheet
item.description: Arc for Servers has a new Azure CLI extension and PowerShell module. Both are still experimental, so expect a few rough edges and please report any issues you see. Because they are prerelease, they are not included (yet) in the main releases (ie, you don’t get this just by installing az cli or the Az module). However they are already functional and useful. Here’s how to do some simple operations with each of them.
